website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, weather-resistant binoculars with clear, crisp focus even in low-light conditions.
pros: Very clear, precise focus at distance
Good magnification, and they are easy to use
Holds up well in wet weather
Fairly lightweight, but rugged enough to take a few bumps or accidental drops
Diopter focus is a nice addition
cons: Lens covers are somewhat flimsy, and tend to fall off the lenses easily
Hard plastic eye cups are somewhat uncomfortable, and some have difficulty getting their eyes to the lenses
Detachable diopter caps can get lost

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Birding Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These are reasonably priced, lightweight, small enough, and yet with great vision. My husband loves them. I'm going to get one for myself. I would recommend these binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: It'sJustMe

customer_reviews.title: The binocular is worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it fits in my hand, so easy to adjust. It was a gift for my husband for backyard birdwatching. Now that we can't go anywhere (Covid-19) we spend a lot of time in our yard. We're able to see every detail on the hummingbirds and mockingbirds. I wish I would have bought it sooner. I have Arthritis in my hands and have problems holding objects but this one is small enough to hold on to. I am going to buy the USCamel binocular for my grandson as a gift. My husband takes the binocular outside each morning he said it is one of the best gifts i ever gave him.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for binoculars but did not want to spend a fortune. These are great! We use them for bird watching and animal watching in our ares. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Binos!
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a gift from my husband. They are a replacement for an older pair of binoculars. These are fantastic! Great magnification, very crisp resolution and light gathering. Can’t wait to use at our cabin to see all the waterfowl on the lake!
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Had them on Safari!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a Safari trip in east Africa. They were excellent. I downgraded them 1-star because they were delivered with one of the plastic pieces that holds the strap broken. I did not have time before my trip to exchange them and because I will not use them often I did not bother to exchange. I'm glad I purchased them because their function was superb.
customer_reviews.author: V. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!! Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.text: What a nice pair of binoculars! I have zero complains as of now. I can't believe how far and clear these are and for the price, I may order another pair for back up. They work better than the three others that I already have. They are too heavy bulky and a pain in the.. I'm so happy these turned out to be everything I had hoped for. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LittleMoosieandWillowsmom

customer_reviews.title: For the price, don't see how you could do much better
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a couple of years and have since purchased 10x42 from a major brand that was 5-6x more expensive, besides a slightly better picture quality at long ranges, 1/2 mile or more, I really cant tell the difference. Unless you are trying to read text at really long distance, save the money and buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We took these on hiking trip to Grand Teton and Yellowstone. Worked great, lightweight
customer_reviews.author: astrosgirl7

customer_reviews.title: Quality Optics
customer_reviews.text: USCAMEL 10x42 binoculars are a quality product that met all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: USCAMEL BINOCULARS
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are exactly what we wanted!! Lightweight, easy to use when kayaking, boating and bird/wildlife watching from our deck at the lake! They arrived quickly, well packaged and with "Instructions"! Great transaction!!
customer_reviews.author: V. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Compact, lightweight, and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is well constructed, attractive, and compact, yet powerful enough to be useful for every adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Chad W.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: A good pair of binoculars without breaking the bank and allowing one to see quite well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: Very good for bird watching or even checking up on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good for bird watching or even checking up on a bunch of puppies at the other side of the property 2-acres away.
customer_reviews.author: Customer again?

customer_reviews.title: The value is the best
customer_reviews.text: Very clear I’ve shown them to many people they were all shock at the price
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Great size for travel
customer_reviews.text: I really like these binoculars. We got them for an upcoming trip. Delivery was fast and they work great out of the box. I really like the size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Josian S

customer_reviews.title: Not lightweight in my opinion, but nice
customer_reviews.text: Kind of heavy for my wife to manage but good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B.S.x2

customer_reviews.title: great little Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I liked that they were small and very easy to focus
customer_reviews.author: Lois Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Nice binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Well made with great viewing. Returned because we were hoping for smaller pair than what we had at vacation home. Wanted another smaller pair just for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly clear at long distances.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lightweight, good quality pair of binoculars for bow hunting. Found ‘em! Everything was as advertised. A nice commitment note inside to provide excellent customer service if needed.
customer_reviews.author: lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great price for quality binoculars
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for bird watching and they are wonderful. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really a binoculars guy but these are very nice.🙂👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clarity
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for an Alaskan cruise and was pleasantly surprised by how well they worked. The clarity is great. Functioned as well as some of the expensive brands we previewed. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: LIKE THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied - will be using for bird watching. Would purchase again. Do not recall when ordering that there was a color choice - received the green - would have preferred the black.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and pretty powerful. We use them for birdwatching. The right eye adjustment is a little loose, but once you get it dialed in you are good to go
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Duchesneau

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Best binoculars for the price I've ever had. Just remember they are not a spotting scope.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Very clear
customer_reviews.text: I was able to ise these to sight rounds on a 12 inch target at 1000 yards. But they are a little flimsy and mine broke. One of the ey pieces broke off. But to be fair they where bouncing around my jeep off road. They still work but are prone tk javibg the piece fall off repeatedly.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are not very good barely see target at a 100 yards good for about 50'
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Not Clear Enough for us
customer_reviews.text: These are being returned. We bought these to take on a cruise to Alaska and neither myself or husband found these clear or easy to focus. We went to Dick's Sporting Goods today and bought Nikon Aculon 211A. They are also 10x42 and WONDERFUL, easy to focus and crystal clear. The Nikon's weigh a little more but will be worth it for the trip!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not fog proof or waterproof like advertised. Wheel screw fell off while out hiking.
customer_reviews.text: The binoculars have a great feel to them. They’re not flimsy plastic like other binoculars of similar pricing. Unfortunately, mine are not water proof or fog proof. I had them out in the rain and they had condensation on the inside of the lens for 2 days. They’re not terrible but not great either. The wheel screw fell off almost immediately. You really don’t need it to function but it’s still nice to lock them into place every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Donato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair. I bought a pair go myself and loved them so much I bought them for my two sons. For the price they are excellent. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: mark koller

customer_reviews.title: Factory mistake
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a year and the right lens has gone out of focus and is now black. Took the eye piece off and it looks like a mistake from factory with gouges in plastic around lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jake A.

product_meta.title: USCAMEL Binoculars for Adults, Compact HD Professional Binoculars for Bird Watching, Travel, Stargazing, Camping, Concerts, Sightseeing
product_meta.description:
Feature: 
10X42 High Power Magnification - With advanced multi-coated lens, compact and portable 10x42 monocular scope gives you a fantastic viewing experience wherever you go. Perfect for Golf, Concerts, Scope, Hiking, Hunting, Archery and Bird watching 
Large BAK-4 Prism & FMC Green Film - BAK4 prism is coated with All-Optical FMC multi-Layer broadband green film, It's guarantee superior light transmission that enables a brighter and clearer view and delivers true to life color definition 
Double Focus Design - To adjust the focal length easily, this HD Zoom Optical Lens is constructed with One-Hand Focus Wheel making it a user-friendly binoculars. Adjustable eye cups can be easily and quickly bent up and down for optimal viewing even without glasses 
Waterproof, Dust-proof & Shockproof Design - binoculars is the ideal travel companion when you go out on hiking expeditions. It is equipped with anti-glare and highly reflective lenses only allowing an optimal level of light to come through while in use 
Compact &Lightweight - Designed with comfort molded grip that provides less shake. Its utmost portability allows you to easily slip it inside your rucksack with the rest of your travel gear 


Specifications: 
Magnification: 10x 
Caliber: 42mm 
Prism System: roof 
Prism Glass: BAK4 
Focus System: Center + Right Eyepiece 
Field Of View: 303 ft /1000 yds 
View Angle: 5.8 
Exit Pupil Diameter : 4mm 
Exit Pupil Distance : 15mm 
Eye Cups : Twist up 
Coating: FMC 
Color: Army Green 


Package Includes: 
1 x Binoculars 
1 x Lens Cleaning Cloth 
1 x Eyepiece cap 
1 x Lens cap 
1 x Carrying case 
1 x Strap 
1 x Instruction book 
1 x color box
feature_bullets: [High Power Binocular] This binoculars has 10x magnification, 42mm objective lens and wide field of view, 305ft/1000yds, makes you look farther and wider. Ideal for bird watching, safari sightseeing, travel, concerts, wildlife watching, outdoor sport activities, etc.

[Twist-up Eyepiece] Eyepieces on binoculars could be twisted up to get a suitable eye distance, getting close to lens and see easily and more confortably. The diameter of eyepiece is about 18mm, you could see more clear images than other binoculars.

[High Quality FMC Optics] FMC coating and premium BAK4 prism, it ensurethe image you view bright and sharp. All design can mostly reflect the light to keep a good image and make you have a amazing experience. Professional binoculars for all outdoor sports activities.

[Durable and Comfort Material] Non-slip framework and rubber armor provides shock-absorbing protection, good resistance for terrible weather conditions. High quality material making, binoculars offers comfortable touching while using it.

[Useful Accessories] Rubber eyepiece cover and lens cover protect the lens of binoculars in good condition. With neck strap and soft carrying case, you feel relax to carry it anywhere handy. Straps is adjustable and wide enough to convey comfort.
